name: AllAreaCodes
description: All Area Codes is your resource for looking up information about area codes and phone numbers in the white pages. For looking up information on a specific phone number, the free reverse phone lookup allows you to see the name and address of phone numbers listed in the white pages of phone books throughout the US.
